title: Basic Intro
description: A basic overview of ChatGPT by an AI scholar, when it was first released.

title: More Advanced
description: A more in-depth look at the applications of ChatGPT, 3 months after initial launch. Shows the incredibly progress and implementations after just a few months after its world-wide release.

title: Chat GPT-4
description: A look at the advancements and improvements of GPT-4 over ChatGPT-3. Demonstrates the exponential improvement of the AI sector as a whole, and points to future applications.

title: Future Speculation
description: A long, in-depth exploration of the possible effects of ChatGPT and other similar products, and where the future of technology and our society might go.

title: How to Use ChatGPT to Learn
description: A great tutorial on how to utilize ChatGPT as a learning assistant. Applicable to many similar lines of thinking an using GPT as an assistant.

title: Ultimate Resource for Prompts
description: A huge, diverse list of links to useful prompts to best use ChatGPT. Great for Novice learnerss and learning more about the product.

title: Educator Guidelines from Open AI
description: OpenAI's guide to ChatGPT for educators. This resource includes everything from classroom use cases to the ethics of using AI classifiers.

title: AI Classifiers FAQ
description: Frequently asked questions about AI classifiers answered by the GPTZero team.

title: How AI Classifiers Work
description: An intuitive explanation of how AI classifiers work, and their fundamental flaws in policing academic honesty.

title: AI Classifier from OpenAI
description: The AI classifier from OpenAI, the creators of ChatGPT.

title: Coursera's Intro to ChatGPT
description: Get up and running with ChatGPT in this 2-hour Novice learners-friendly course created by Coursera. Course price: $9.99

title: edX's Intro to ChatGPT
description: Get comfortable with using ChatGPT in your everyday workflow in this 2-hour course created by edX. Course price: FREE to audit, $20.00 for certificate.

title: Codecademy's Intro to ChatGPT
description: Learn about generative AI and writing effective prompts along with the limitations of ChatGPT in this 7-hour from Codecademy. Course price: FREE to audit, $34.99/mo for certificate.

title: DeepLearning.AI's NLP and Attention Models Course
description: Explore the world of AI in greater depth with this 35-hour course on Natrual Language Processing and Attention Models from DeepLearning.AI. Course price: 7-day free trial, $49.00/mo after trial ends.

title: LinkedIn Learning's Intro to Prompt Engineering
description: Discover the new world of Prompt Engineering in this 2-hour LinkedIn Learning course from Ronnie Sheer. Course price: 30-day free trail, $39.99/mo after trial ends.
